title: Senior Microbiologist-QC FDA
tagsAndSkills: Chemical Testing,Bacterial Endotoxin Test,Microbial Limit Test,Sop Management,Environmental Monitoring,Water Validation,Microbiology,Water Testing
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

1. Microbiological analysis of water & finish products.

2. Maintain Micro lab with respect to temp, humidity, pressure differential etc.

3. Environmental monitoring.

4. Maintaining microbial culture.

5. Media Preparation & steri I ization.

6. Maintaining a1l labels (Autoclave, Media Preparation, Calibration, Media receipt &

consumption, Fumigation etc)

7. Validation of instruments with collaboration of outside party

8. Strict Adherence to GLP.

9. Sampling of Purified water and MIDC water as per SOP.

10. To carry out microbiological and chemical analysis of water as per Standard Test Procedure.

11. To maintain the records of media preparation, sterilization, Growth promotion test, culture maintenance.

12. To carry out Microbiological analysis for finish product for microbial contamination test.

13. To carry out Microbiological environment monitoring of clean room area and manufacturing area.

14. To maintain the record for instruments/equipments in microbiology laboratory.

15. To review analytical data for microbial analysis.

16. To maintain the laboratory for good housekeeping.

17. To perform various validations water system, cleaning etc.

18. To prepare & review of SOP, STP, Specifications, Validation protocol & report.

19.  To perform calibration of instruments/equipments.

20.  Batch release for microbial limit test.

title: Sales Executive
tagsAndSkills: complaint handling,cold calling,networking,business development,market research,media,advertising,corporate sales
jobDescription:
Congrow Manpower Solutions is looking for Sales Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Conduct market research to identify selling possibilities and evaluate customer needs
  2. Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking and social media
  3. Set up meetings with potential clients and listen to their wishes and concerns
  4. Prepare and deliver appropriate presentations on products and services
  5. Create frequent reviews and reports with sales and financial data
  6. Ensure the availability of stock for sales and demonstrations
  7. Participate on behalf of the company in exhibitions or conferences
  8. Negotiate/close deals and handle complaints or objections
  9. Collaborate with team members to achieve better results
  10. Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share with internal teams

title: Lead Generation Executive
tagsAndSkills: digital marketing,email marketing,cold calling,customer relationship,business development,sales,research,expdp
jobDescription:
Congrow Manpower Solutions is looking for Lead Generation Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • The Lead Generation Executive is responsible for generating new sales leads and building relationships with potential customers through various marketing channels
  • The role involves researching target markets, identifying potential customers, and developing a strategy to engage with them
  • The Lead Generation Executive plays a critical role in supporting the sales team and ensuring the success of the organization's sales efforts
Key Responsibilities:
  • Conduct research to identify potential customers and target markets
  • Develop and implement a strategy to engage with potential customers through various marketing channels, such as email, social media, and phone
  • Generate leads through targeted campaigns, including email marketing, social media outreach, and cold calling
  • Qualify leads based on the organization's sales criteria and assign them to the appropriate sales representative
  • Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all leads and activities in the organization's customer relationship management (CRM) system
  • Develop and maintain relationships with potential customers through ongoing communication and follow-up

title: Customer Service Executive
tagsAndSkills: customer relationship,customer service,customer complaints,customer care,customer interaction,upsell,sales process,sales
jobDescription:
Congrow Manpower Solutions is looking for Customer Service Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, or live chat in a timely and professional manner
  • Resolve customer complaints and issues, and escalate to higher-level management as necessary
  • Record customer interactions and transactions in a customer service database
  • Maintain a thorough knowledge of the company's products, services, and processes
  • Provide customers with information about product features, pricing, and availability
  • Cross-sell and upsell products and services to meet customer needs and increase sales
  • Process customer orders, returns, and exchanges in a timely and efficient manner
  • Follow up with customers to ensure their needs have been met and to resolve any outstanding issues

title: Sr. System Administrator / IT Infra Head - Clover Infotech
tagsAndSkills: Procurement,System Administration,Vendor Management,CCNA,Desktop Support,Desktop Administration,Laptop Support,Head - Technical Support
jobDescription:
Sr. System Administrator / IT Infra Head


Experience: 15+ Years

Education: Any Graduate (full time)

Job location: Andheri East - Mumbai / Airoli - Navi Mumbai (Work from Office)



Job Description.

  1. Proficiency in Windows support; knowledge of Linux OS is considered advantageous.
  2. Strong troubleshooting and Installation skills for operating systems, particularly Windows, Database related softwares, Outlook, VPN-related issues, etc.
  3. Knowledge of hardware components and experience in handling hardware-related problems mainly Desktop, Laptop, and Printers.
  4. Familiarity with networking concepts like DNS,DHCP and ability to perform tasks like cable crimping.
  5. Excellent communication skills and ability to convey technical information effectively.
  6. Experience providing EUC support via various channels such as Remote, telephone, tickets, and emails.
  7. Knowledge of Windows Active Directory, and File Servers, M365.
  8. Familiarity with Virtualization technologies would be an added advantage.
  9. Work closely with the IT team across all locations to ensure seamless communication and avoid any gaps.
  10. Ability to maintain detailed documentation of configurations and procedures.
  11. Capability to generate and present reports on system performance and incidents.
  12. Willing to work in rotational shifts.


Experience:

  • 15 - 20 years

Qualification:

  • Any Graduate with Good Communication skills Should have attended trainings A+, N+, and CCNA,MCSA, MCSE.
  • Certifications such as CompTIA A+, Network+, or Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate (optional but beneficial).


Please Share & Refer resume at ajay.kurlekar@cloverinfotech.com
